rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Vastu-compliant north or east facing position, designed to welcome positive energy.
An open living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side for natural light. Vastu principles suggest placing the main entrance in the east or north, ensuring proper alignment.
A dining area adjacent to the living room. Vastu guidelines recommend dining on the east side for better energy flow, with a design that supports spacious interaction.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and natural light from south-facing windows. Designed to ensure proper ventilation as per Vastu recommendations.
A guest bathroom, ensuring privacy and functionality, placed in the west corner to counteract negative energies according to Vastu.
Small utility room for laundry or storage; located strategically for ease of access while maintaining aesthetic balance.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing north as per Vastu guidelines to welcome positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Large window installation to ensure proper lighting and airflow.
